ComicInfo.Summary:
The Sinister Skull of Doctor-7: Doctor-7 escapes from prison and disguises himself as a fake phrenologist to lure Mark Merlin into a trap.
The Man Who Destroyed Eclipso: Mona discovers that her boyfriend, Bruce Gordon, is actually Eclipso. Bruce decides to meet an old friend, Judson Randall, and he finds him apparently imprisoned within a luminous blob. He allows Judson to try to cure him of Eclipso. Eclipso is released, but he is now under Judson's control.
